column4: Guys my internal DNS is bloody spotty and crap, because of the dumb little modem router I have... What DNS server would you recommend for a bit of a n00b (but not a complete idiot ;-) )
yeah that's what I mean.. is there serveral sorts of DNS server or is there just one generic package?
almost everybody uses bind for that. you're probably gonna have to do some reading to set it up correctly though.
